name: Cinamac
description: Mobile responsive Movie app that uses API's to allow the user to get info on movies playing in theater, theaters nearby, daily/weekly trending movies/tv-shows. Users can also search for movies/tv-shows/actors, which will provide a description, and a few facts about searched item.

name: Hogwart Library
description: Welcome to Hogwarts library where you can view Witches and Wizards, view Spells and even create your own Spells and Wizards! If you want to become a Witch or Wizard you can take a quiz to figure out what house best fits you, or let destiny decide your fate.
skills: HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Express, MVC, API, MySQL, Express, Bcrypt, Micron.js, Express-session, Express-handlebars

name: Weather Report
description: Weather Report is an application that uses third party APIs from https://openweathermap.org/ to access their data on weather forecasts for desired city. Search a City name and get the current weather, and a 5 day forecast.
